item.title: Getting Started with Webpack
item.description: Per definition here, Webpack is a static module bundler for Web applications. It analyses and processes the input application and generates output bundles. The design of Webpack architecture is highly modularised and extendable. In this post, I share here some notes on major aspects of Webpack since I’ve started learning it. Source: https://webpack.github.io Main Concepts Configuration Webpack’s configuration is defined using a file webpack.config.js. It is essentially a JavaScript source file.
